title: Remove the Free Case Review section and repoint all CTAs/links

requirements.text: Remove the “Free Case Review” section from the landing page so it is no longer rendered and the page no longer contains a section with id="free-case-review".

quotes: You can remove the free case review section

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page no longer renders the FreeCaseReviewSection component.
There is no DOM element with id="free-case-review" on the page.
Build succeeds with no unused-import TypeScript errors in LandingPage.

requirements.text: Update all navigation links and call-to-action buttons that currently scroll to the removed "free-case-review" section so they instead scroll to a remaining section (use a dedicated "Contact" target anchored near the footer). Replace user-facing CTA text that mentions “free case review” with equivalent consultation/contact wording in English.

quotes: You can remove the free case review section

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation no longer includes a link labeled “Free Case Review”.
Hero primary CTA no longer scrolls to id="free-case-review" and no longer says “Start Your Free Case Review”.
Each “Active Lawsuits” item no longer scrolls to id="free-case-review" and no longer uses the label “Start your free case review”.
Footer “Quick Links” no longer includes “Free Case Review”.
Clicking the updated CTAs performs smooth scrolling to the chosen Contact/footer anchor on both desktop and mobile menus.

requirements.text: Update any remaining page copy that references submitting or completing a “case review form” so it does not imply the existence of a form on the site.

quotes: You can remove the free case review section

acceptanceCriteria: No visible paragraph text encourages the user to “complete this short form” or “submit a case review form”.
Footer disclaimer text is adjusted so it does not reference “Submitting a case review form” (keep the disclaimer otherwise intact and in English).

constraints: Do not edit files in frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Keep the app as a one-page site with smooth scroll behavior for navigation.
Do not route any images through the backend.
nonGoals: Removing the Motoko backend canister methods or stored FreeCaseReview data.
Adding a new backend endpoint or introducing new third-party integrations.
Redesigning unrelated sections beyond necessary CTA/link/copy updates caused by removing the Free Case Review section.
